extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2025-0282 or CVE-2025-0283 by retrieving the installed version of Ivanti products.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2025-0282 or CVE-2025-0283?

extracted_playbook.title: Run External and Internal Integrity Checker Tool (ICT)
extracted_playbook.description: Execute both external and internal ICT scans on affected devices to check for indicators of compromise.

extracted_playbook.title: Ensure Non-Internet Facing Products Are Not Exposed
extracted_playbook.description: Verify that products like Ivanti Policy Secure, which are not supposed to be Internet facing, are effectively not exposed to the Internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Search Logs for Suspicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Search in the logs for HTTP requests matching specific patterns and suspicious gaps in logging activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Start Forensic Investigation
extracted_playbook.description: Initiate a forensic investigation to analyze the suspicious activities detected on the affected devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Affected Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected products to the latest available patch if no signs of compromise are observed.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Available Patch for Ivanti Connect Secure
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the available patch for Ivanti Connect Secure to mitigate the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Monitor and Await Patch Availability
extracted_playbook.description: Monitor the situation and await patch availability for Ivanti Policy Secure and Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways.

affected_products: Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways 22.7R2 through 22.7R2.3
Ivanti Connect Secure 22.7R2.4 and prior, 9.1R18.9 and prior
Ivanti Neurons for ZTA gateways 22.7R2.3 and prior
